name: Dead Vignette
description:
After getting separated from the rest of her team, Chem continues onward in a desperate attempt to escape from cannibals that are in pursuit of their next meal. Guide Chem as she makes her way from safe house to safe house all while fending off feral creatures that inhabit the area.

This is a single player game that is very short (approx. 1 hour long). While being created using RPG Maker MV, this game utilizes almost no assets from the program creating a very unique RPG Maker experience.

Please click on this link to view the game guide (recommended)

https://jimenez708.wixsite.com/pantomimegames/assets
